scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Presentation of Christ Child in the Temple. The Virgin Mary, in a blue robe and with a halo, stands to the left, holding the Christ Child. The Christ Child, also with a halo, is being presented by an elderly man, likely Simeon, who is dressed in a red robe and a blue hat. He is holding the child and appears to be speaking. Behind them, several other figures are visible, including women in red head coverings and men. The background is a red textile with a gold diamond pattern. The figures are gathered around a wooden altar or table.
